SA15sbpramvu:0_10: 3 /// .. nte / na bhidyante pāramārthikā arthās tataḥ kāraṇāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:0_11: sāmānyam idaṃ bahūnāṃ / tathā dharmāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ ca bheda ity api yo 'yaṃ bhedo nānātvavyavahāraḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_12: sa bauddhe 'rthe na bāhye svalakṣaṇe buddhipratibhāsasyālīkatvāt kathaṃ tatra kṛtakatvādidharmabheda iti ced āha /
SA15sbpramvu:0_13: tasyaiva cetyādi / buddhipratibhāsasyaiva etad uktaṃ bhavati bāhyenaikatvādhyavasāyā /
SA15sbpramvu:0_15: ata evāha prakalpyata iti / yathā pratyakṣeṇa vastusvalakṣaṇam eva gṛhyate tathā sādhanānumitenānityatvādinā sādhyadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaṃ svalakṣaṇam eva kasmān na gṛhyata ity āha sādhyetyādi /
SA15sbpramvu:0_16: idaṃ sādhyam idaṃ sādhanam ity asmin saṃkalpe vastudarśanahānitaḥ kutaḥ sva /
SA15sbpramvu:0_17: 5 /// .. nyāpohaviśiṣṭo bhedo gṛhyata ity abhidhānād ācāryadiṅnāgaprabhṛtiḥ svalakṣaṇasya sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭasya grahaṇaṃ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_18: pratijñātam ity āśaṅkām apanayann āha bheda ityādi /
SA15sbpramvu:0_19: bhedaḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ pratīyata ity atrāpi vacane grāhyaṃ na svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇam eva nirdiṣṭam iti naivaṃ boddhavyam ity arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_20: v1 /// ṣṭā gṛhyanta iti tatrāpi boddhavyaṃ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_21: anye tu bhedaḥ sāmānyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭo grāhya iti pulliṅgena paṭhanti /
SA15sbpramvu:0_22: tatrāyam artho bhedaḥ / sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo grāhya ity atrāpi vacane na svalakṣaṇaṃ boddhavyaṃ iti /
SA15sbpramvu:0_23: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatraivaṃ boddhavyam iti ced āha samānetyādi /
SA15sbpramvu:0_25: na tat svalakṣaṇagrāhyaṃ kathaṃcana kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tatraikasmiṃ svalakṣaṇe kṛtakatvānityatvādirūpeṇa bahubhedānān dharmāṇāṃ kiṃ viśiṣṭānāṃ bhedānāṃ vasturūpāṇāṃ tatraikasmin svalakṣaṇe 'yogāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:0_26: na hy ekasmin vastuni vasturūpāṇi bahūni yujyante niraṃśatvāt* svalakṣaṇa /
SA15sbpramvu:0_27: 3 /// .. .. .. .. tatprātipādikā śrutir iti asādhāraṇena rūpeṇa tasya svalakṣaṇasya pratipādakaḥ śabdo nāsti kalpanā vāsti nety prakṛtaṃ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_28: asādhāraṇena rūpeṇa svalakṣaṇasya grāhako vikalpāpi nāstīty arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:0_29: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyenaiva śabdasya kalpanāyāś ca vṛttitaḥ tatpratipādikā na śrutir astīti bruvatā svalakṣaṇe /
SA15sbpramvu:0_30: 4 /// punar ityādi / na tu sāmānyenaiva vṛttita ity anantaram uktatvād ayuktaṃ codyaṃ /

SA15sbpramvu:0_33: tata svalakṣaṇaṃ tadā vyavahārakāle nāsti na hi saṃketa /
SA15sbpramvu:0_34: 5 /// .. .. / .. .. .. pasya vyaktyantare saṃbhavābhāvāt* yāpy ekā vyaktiḥ saṃketaviṣayatvenābhimatā tasyā api kṣaṇikatvāt* /

SA15sbpramvu:1_1: r1 /// .. .. kiñcid vastu .. .. .. .. .. anyatreti yatra vyaktibhede tayā āskantavyaṃ /

SA15sbpramvu:1_5: yadi vyatiriktasya sāmānyasyāsaṃbandhān na vyaktyantare svākārajñānajananam evaṃ tarhy ādyāyām api vyaktau tattulyam iti kim ucyate vyaktiṣv apūrvāsv iti /

SA15sbpramvu:1_8: .. .. va tatvānyatvābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ saṃbhavatīty āha svabhāvo hītyādi svabhāvāt tatvam anyatvaṃ vā na laṃghayatīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:1_10: tato 'nyatvād ity arthaḥ / astv atadrūpatvam anyatvaṃ tu kasmād i .
SA15sbpramvu:1_12: ākārāntaravat* / ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatiḥ / tathā hi sukhād duḥkhasyāpi anyatvam asukharūpam* duḥkham ity eva kṛtvā iyatā tadrūpasyānyatvalakṣaṇena vyāptir uktā /

SA15sbpramvu:2_18: na tathābhūtasya vastvātmakasya grāhyasya samāveśād grahaṇād anumānavikapasya vastusaṃvādaḥ /

SA15sbpramvu:3_18: 5 /// ṇa saṃbandhāyogāt* tasmād ekavyaktinityatātmanaḥ sāmānyasya nāsti tasminn eva kāle bhinnadeśena dravyena saṃbandhaḥ /

SA15sbpramvu:23_30: 3 /// .. .. .. .. mānaṃ dṛṣṭāntānapekṣatām edva na hītyādinā prāha /
SA15sbpramvu:23_31: asyām ity anupalabdhau kiṃ na nirupākhyam ityādi ācāryaḥ dṛṣṭānta evety arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:23_32: tad asad ityādi paraḥ / tad vyomakusumādi asad iti kathaṃ kena pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ yenaivaṃ syāt* /
SA15sbpramvu:23_33: anupalaabdher liṅgād abhāve sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:23_36: athātrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tasyā vyomakusumādyasattāsiddheḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:23_37: tatrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tatrāpy aparo 'pīti kṛtvā /
SA15sbpramvu:23_38: tathā cānavasthāyāṃ satyāṃ ekasyāpi siddhāv apratipattiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:23_40: 5 /// .. labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya anupalabdher ityādāv api prayoge dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇād ananumānam anupalabdhiḥ /
SA15sbpramvu:23_41: śṛṇvann apīty ācāryaḥ / sakṛd uktaṃ yathā svabhāvānupalabdhau nābhāvaḥ sādhyate kiṃtu abhāvavyavahāra iti tacchṛṇvann api /
SA15sbpramvu:23_42: mūrkhasya trīṇi nāmāni devo divyaḥ prajayatir ity ato devānāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ pri .
SA15sbpramvu:23_45: sā nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadvyavahārāṇāṃ sānupalabdhiḥ svasannidhānād ātmanā sannidhānāt* /
